name: "Invitation" to the Society (Skill Card)
text:
Society / Skill
[ACTIVATION]
At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
[EFFECT]
If your opponent's monster is equipped with "White Veil" you control, take control of that monster while it's equipped with "White Veil". 
You can only attack with monsters equipped with "White Veil" the turn you activate "White Veil".
